typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		na_code as string,
		na_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tNotApplicable
source(output(
		dimension_name as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> tTopGroup
tNotApplicable, tTopGroup join(na_code == top_key,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
tTopGroup filter(dimension_name=='dim_capital') ~> Filter1
